label: Medical University of South Carolina Memorandum, July 15, 1975
description: Medical University of South Carolina memorandum from Loring E. Van Kleek, Safety Coordinator, to R. E. Clark, Director of Physical Plant, regarding a "rubuttal to unsubstantiated allegations of Mr. Samuel West, Medical University employee in Physical Plant."
